title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, when a new file is created on Windows using Eclipse, it has Windows line delimiters instead of Unix line delimiters.
EB: The expected behavior is that even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters, since the end product is a Unix product.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use a Unix and Windows work station to develop a Unix product/program.
2. Open Eclipse on the Windows machine.
3. Create a new file.
4. Check the line delimiters used in the new file.
